full_description:
Walton Walpad 10H Pro Tablet With Flip Cover & BT Keyboard

The Walton Walpad 10H Pro Tablet provides sleek and powerful performance in your hands. Including Walpad 10H Pro, the ultimate companion for your work and entertainment. Walpad 10H Pro, the ideal partner for both business and leisure, is included. Together with an incredibly stylish and thin design and a small, convenient frame for portability, it offers exceptional performance. With the 5MP selfie camera, you can easily attend formal meetings and stay in touch with loved ones. Take breathtakingly detailed pictures with the FHD 13MP rear camera. With the Walpad 10H Pro's integrated Google Meet and dual camera setup, staying connected is simple. Always remain in the picture, regardless of the distance, whether you're catching up with family, hanging out with friends, or attending business meetings. Get amazing sound quality with these cutting-edge dual bottom-firing speakers. These speakers' sound cavity design and strong amplifier chip produce immersive, clear treble, rich bass, and deep, rich sound that enhances the quality of your games, movies, and music. Put an end to waiting for WiFi. There is hybrid dual SIM support available with the Walpad 10H Pro. You can use one Sim and one MicroSD card, or two Nano-Sims at once. This dual standby has a GPS, a gyroscope, and a hall sensor. Enjoy a smooth connection whether you're browsing, streaming, or downloading things.

10.36-inch Sharp Display

The display on the Walton Walpad 10H Pro Tablet provides an excellent and comfortable viewing experience. The 10.36-inch FHD (2000x1200) IPS panel display offers vibrant, bright colors from every angle. Additionally, the display boasts a narrow bezel design that enhances the screen-to-body ratio and provides a sleek, contemporary appearance. Additionally, the display has in-call technology that lets you use the tablet to make and take calls. Additionally, the display features an eye care mode that lessens blue light emission and shields your eyes from tiredness and strain. The display of the Walton Walpad 10H Pro Tablet blends design, functionality, and quality.

Drive with Power

With its two Arm Cortex-A76 processing units, which have a clock speed of up to 2.2GHz, the MediaTek MT6789 Octa-Core chipset can boost your gaming skills. With lightning-fast memory and sufficient storage speed, the Walpad 10H Pro can manage multitasking. assists you in keeping all of your priceless moments, even in cases where a 2TB extension is necessary. Efficiently launching, launching apps in the background, and multitasking are all made possible by a massive 8GB of RAM.

All-Day Action with 18W Fast Charging

The stylish Walpad 10H Pro's remarkable 6200 mAh battery ensures all-day use. Additionally, the 18W quick charging removes waiting time so you can resume working, watching, or playing right away.

full_description:
Walton Walpad 8G 4GB RAM 64GB Storage 8" Tablet

The Walton Walpad 8G 8" Tablet is a versatile device. With an 8-inch HD display with a resolution of 1280 x 800 pixels, the tablet provides a clean and clear image. With 4GB of RAM and a 2 GHz quad-core processor, it provides fluid performance for multitasking and using applications. The tablet has 512GB of expandable internal storage in addition to its 64GB of storage, giving users plenty of room for documents, media, and programs. Bluetooth 5.0 and Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n/AC, which support the 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, are two connectivity alternatives that guarantee reliable wireless communication. The addition of USB-C and OTG improves its peripheral compatibility and connection. The Walton Walpad 8G 8" Tablet, running Android 11, offers a safe and easy-to-use operating system. The Walton tablet is compatible with a variety of media files since it supports a broad range of audio formats, such as MP3, M4A, AAC, OGG, WAV, and WMA. The tablet's physical measurements are 122*197.4*8.1 mm, and its weight of approximately 380 grams makes it lightweight and portable. The Walton Walpad 8G 8" Tablet is compatible with GSM, HSPA, UMTS, and LTE networks for mobile connectivity. It has a 2MP front camera for video calls and an 8MP rear camera for taking sharp pictures. It can record videos at 60 frames per second at an FHD 1920 x 1080 resolution. A 5000 mAh lithium-ion battery powers the Walton tablet, ensuring a longer battery life. An accelerometer and a light sensor are examples of special features that improve the user experience overall. The Walton Walpad 8G tablet is a feature-rich device that can be used for a range of purposes, including productivity and communication as well as surfing and video consumption.
